alert.note: Alert for Greer; Jackson; Kiowa; Tillman; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 6:44AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Washita, Jackson, western Kiowa, western Tillman, Greer, northwestern Archer, western Wichita, southeastern Foard, Wilbarger, Baylor and southeastern Hardeman Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 643 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Mangum to near Seymour. Movement was east-northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Altus, Vernon, Frederick, Mangum, Seymour, Electra, Granite, Sentinel, Tipton, Blair, Chillicothe, Olustee, Eldorado, Lone Wolf, Davidson, Martha, Elmer, Headrick, Friendship, and Altus Air Force Base. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
